service.name: Home Service in COVID-19 Situation
service.description: In covid19 setuation, we are providing doctor's services at home. You may get a appointment with doctor at Online and get suggestion from home. 'STAY HOME, STAY SAFE'

service.name: Ward/Cabin services
service.description: We have premium quality Cabin/Ward. 'STAY HOME, STAY SAFE'

service.name: Emergency
service.description: Trauma and non-trauma medical and surgical emergencies round the clock at the ground floor in level-1 of the hospital with a separate entrance. 'STAY HOME, STAY SAFE'

service.name: Obstetrics and Gynae
service.description: We have established a comprehensive gynecology and obstetrics department that is known as MOMOTA in A-block(5th floor). 'STAY HOME, STAY SAFE'

service.name: Stroke ICU with full support
service.description: Stroke Unit, under direct supervision of Prof. M. A. Hayee, who is the pioneer in Neuro-Intervention in Bangladesh, provides neurological treatment for the patients with diversified number of neurological disease like diseases of brain (stroke/infection), diseases of spinal cord etc.

service.name: NICU
service.description: NICU provides the most comprehensive care for newborns in Bangladesh. It is the major neonatal referral centre.

service.name: PICU
service.description: Paediatric Intensive care unit (PICU) is a highly specialized unit which provides intensive care of critically sick children from 1 month to 16 years of age.

service.name: BLOOD BANK
service.description: Government registered hospital blood bank in Dhaka. Providing 24-hour service, most secure blood transfusion policy, and we maintain quality in every stride.

service.name: Dialysis
service.description: We are having well established Dialysis Center Since 1980, which is situated in the 2nd floor of A block.

service.name: Surgery
service.description: We ensure about all types of surgery support of modern technology including C-arm, Operating microscope, Arthroscopy etc.

service.name: Cardiac Center
service.description: Cardiac problems are very common now a days all over the world. It is also the number one cause of morbidity and mortality in Bangladesh.

service.name: Oncology
service.description: This units has 8 cabin and 5 beds with specially trained doctors and nurses and giving 24 hours service for indoor and out-door (OPD basis) cancer patients.
